sentences.sentence: This New Zealand winery produces some of the best antipodean wines.
sentences.translation: 这家新西兰酿酒厂出产一些最好的澳新葡萄酒。

sentences.sentence: After that perhaps will come the zest and confidence of an Antipodean California.
sentences.translation: 如此一来，我们也许能够有幸目睹到一个自信，奔放，但却与加州截然不同的“黄金之国”。

sentences.sentence: Today the sea was gentle compared with antipodean oceans where I have sported like a dolphin.
sentences.translation: 我曾经像只海豚一般在南太平洋遨游，相比之下今天这片海温柔多了。
